Definitely for mature audiences only, but I enjoy getting skills for my characters, all of the different characters in general and I appreciate the special events that can give you extra points to use on said skills.  I appreciate that the developers seem to always be trying to find ways to keep the game fresh and interesting as well as periodically introducing new characters.  I have to have them all!

Comecei a jogar esses dias, o que tenho a dizer é que gostei muito, no começo comprei soh o pyramid head e o nemesis porque gosto das franquias, mas depois acabei comprando quase todos os assassinos para brincar mesmo e ver a jogabilidade de cada um.
Vejo o pessoal falando que o jogo é desequilibrado , eu concordo que o lado do assassino é melhor pelo fato de eu ser novato e mesmo novato matar todos os sobreviventes mesmo sem perks(vantagens) para os assassinos, é claro que eu caio contra sovreviventes iniciantes também mas mesmo assim, para ganhar de sovrevivente tem que jogar em equipe, mas no mínimo um vai morrer, somente se o assassivo for muito ruim vai deixar todos escaparem.
Fora isso o jogo é muito bom, nunca achei que fosse gostar dele mesmo depois de ver tantas gameplays por ai.

Very fun horror game. It does have its bugs and toxic people but we see that everywhere and you can just ignore it. I love having the option to play as survivor and the suspense of being chased, or as killer and get some revenge for my bad games as survivor. Would only recommend to those who can handle horror and losing because its not an easy game to win constantly.

I've barely played this game as a survivor in public matches, but I can tell you that this game is great between friends in Customs, taking turns to be the killer and overall having fun. However I cant' say the same about public games, the match making is absurd and non-existent, as a survivor you might go against a killer than is more experienced than you in the game and as a killer you might even end up going against survivors who gen-rush you within 5 minutes - giving you no time to react and actually play the game. To add onto that the grinding in this game is absurd, if you want specific killers you need to dump money to get them, which is fine, nothing wrong with that, but it is an issue when even the normal killers require MULTIPLE hours just to be unlocked, and due to perks being unique to each killer (unless you unlock the teachable of said perk) you will also spend hours upon hours of grinding just to get those perks. On the bright side the developers do try and award you in multiple different ways so that it's easier for you to get the perks, but in order to get the killers and certain survivors? You either dump multiple hours to get them or you spend money.

STILL THOUGH, ITS FUN WITH FRIENDS!

Pretty good game actually! Both Killer and Survivor offer a totally different fresh gameplay style, i would actually recommend both. If you are have some friends (which u wont), survivor gameplay gets waaaaaay more fun. People keep crying about bugs etc. but its not bothering me at all. 
Survivor is cool since there are a lot of different survivors to play. Even though the gameplay itself wont change a lot, the perks you can choose for yourself do!!! Its a lot of grinding games, but once u find some fun perks to play with, the game gets a lot more fun.

Would recommend for sure! You should defo try out atleast a few games of Survivor and Killer!

I've been playing dead by daylight for about two years on the Xbox One. Overall, always loved the game and still do! I'm new to playing with a PC so currently not the greatest gamer and that's okay, I'll get better overtime.

It takes a lot for me to remain interested and invested in a game, and somehow DBD does it. My criticisms are mainly directed at the devs and toxic killers. There is a 'reporting' system in the game but not once, ever, have I seen or heard of one of those reports being actioned. Even with a toxic killer who facecamps and makes the game unplayable, or survivors who sabotage other survivors, or players hurling racist and transphobic slurs in chat - I'm sure the devs know all of this but they don't care to do anything about it because they know we'll still keep playing despite how toxic and disgusting it can be sometimes. 

I enjoy the game, but it's bitter-sweet. I don't know that I can actually recommend this to anyone.

On top of the game is nothing but swf now which i mean is fine except that killers keep getting nerfed to the point nurse and spirit is mainly the only options that are 4k viable at higher ranks. Gens pop off so fast nowadays its boring. When the fixes are done im sure more people will come back. Always said this game was a brilliant idea, just poorly executed....
